snippet: The government said the criminal charges against Michael J. Coscia, founder of Panther Energy Trading, were the first to be brought under new rules that bar a type of abusive trading called spoofing.
abstract: The government said the criminal charges against Michael J. Coscia, founder of Panther Energy Trading, were the first to be brought under new rules that bar a type of abusive trading called spoofing.

headline.main: High-Frequency Trader Charged With Manipulating Commodity Prices

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
